faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common queries about our AI Image Generator.

items.title: What kind of images can I generate?
items.description: You can create a wide range of images, including landscapes, characters, abstract art, and more based on the descriptions you provide.

items.title: Is there a cost to using the generator?
items.description: The basic service is free, allowing users a daily limit on image generations. For unlimited access, we offer competitive subscription plans.

items.title: Can I use my generated images commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users with a paid plan can utilize generated images for commercial purposes, while free-tier users may only use them for personal projects.

items.title: How does the AI maintain privacy?
items.description: All generation processes take place in your browser, ensuring that your original ideas and generated images remain private and secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Images?
footer.description: Try our AI Image Generator now and experience the future of creativity. No sign-up necessary.
